Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed in a sprint

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the overall budget consumption of a project

Name: maximize_high_priority_feature_completion
Description: Prioritize and maximize the completion of features with the highest priority

Name: minimize_unresolved_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of active blockers that impede progress

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average amount of work a team can get done during a sprint

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of sprints that successfully achieve their defined sprint goal

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the self-reported satisfaction of the team in retrospectives

Name: maximize_high_priority_story_completion
Description: Prioritize and maximize the completion of user stories with the highest priority

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize the sum of effort for all tasks within a sprint to improve efficiency

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with high influence

Name: minimize_epic_effort
Description: Minimize the estimated effort for large requirements (Epics)

Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Maximize focus on projects that have the highest overall priority

Name: minimize_task_completion_time
Description: Minimize the time it takes to complete individual tasks
